response.overview: A complex exploration of bodies and cultures, set amidst the environmental change caused by global warming. Shot on the Thai tropical island Ko Yao Yai, the director explores the economic and cultural challenges the island faces as it shifts from a predominantly farming community to one dependent on tourism. While the environmental instability underlining Warm Spell unfolds, the director constructs a dreamlike backdrop for more personal explorations of the island and its influence on the body.
response.title: Warm Spell
